messages.message:
Where or which service will be making calls out to stripe api ?
Is there a configured API in config and credentials ?
If I remember correctly, it is all out there in Webapp
three services webapp, api-server and license where it is configured with.

api key controlled by k8s secret,
```           - name: STRIPE_SECRET_KEY
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  name: secret-stripe-api-keys
                  key: stripe-secret-api-key
            - name: STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SIGNING_SECRET
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  name: secret-stripe-api-keys
                  key: stripe-signing-secret```
Do you know where the api endpoint is configured ?

I think it calls metronome api which is defined here
/shared-utils/py-utils/config-utils/src/py/instabase/config_utils/config.py
my understanding is, Metronome calculates charges and Stripe processes payments
Correct. Stripe is also used when setting up a new org account (we register the account with Stripe)
Technically, Stripe is not necessary for enterprise deployments either.
Metronome is necessary on the other hand.
